entry.title: Third Time's The Charm
entry.summary:
Author: novasillies

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 194,779Chapters: 15/46Kudos: 101

Summary: "You're a person people are better off without."Theo's words struck hard and deep. The claws of them dug in and twisted, mangled him relentlessly."That's not on me."-Stiles goes back in time again to stop the Hale House fire. It rings true for the rest of his life that he seems to break more than he fixes.Updates! Every! Thursday! Except for when it doesn’t (back from hiatus! :))

entry.title: No Graves for the Forgotten
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 94,564Chapters: 14/?Kudos: 75

Summary: He’s the face behind the throne.The ghost of a golden palace.The man married to the monster who destroyed everything.Stiles Stilinski has learned how to disappear in plain sight — with soft lips, dangerous eyes, and a body trained to please, not to feel.Derek Hale should hate him.But everything about Stiles is a provocation: the low voice, the crooked smile, the whispered secrets in the shadows of rebellion.They meet by accident.Then, by necessity.Soon, by desire.But Stiles carries secrets that could bring empires down — and an emptiness only Derek seems to see.In a world where love is a weapon and loyalty is a convenient lie, some sparks don’t fade.They burn everything in their path.

entry.summary:
Author: Ann_shawol24

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 21,270Chapters: 16/61Kudos: 18

He is young and above all it had been a mistake.What will be the effect of this decision on the human's life? And on the other members of the pack?This story brings reality at its best. English is not my first language, I apologize in advance, original version in Spanish on Wattpad.

entry.title: Wuther My Heights, Mr. Hale
entry.summary:
Author: Waddiwasii

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,029Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 31

Summary: Stiles works at a bookstore.Derek owns the building.They meet on a Tuesday.By Sunday, he’s moving into Derek’s spare room.It’s not meant to be anything at all.But turns out to be everything he ever wanted.And now Derek doesn’t know how he could possibly ever let him go.It starts with Wuthering Heights and ends with Stiles in Derek’s bed. Somewhere in between, there’s an eviction notice, a spare room, and the terrifying possibility of being loved back.Oh, and a one-eyed cat.And sex.There’s also sex.

entry.title: Retrieve My Body
entry.summary:
Author: Lois_Rose33

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,524Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 70

Summary: -I promise that if La Abuela doesn´t know about this i´ll be your slave- Cora says.   -That is if we survive- Erica adds a bit fearful.   -Who are you?- Derek asks in the empty room.   Before moving without control, the Ouija ring pauses over one of the letters and starts spelling something out.   “S” “T” “I” “L” “E” “S”   “STILES” spelled the being.  -What the hell is supposed to be a Stiles?- Derek blurts out................Or Derek meets ghost Stiles making fun of her sister and her friends playing with a Ouija and gets to know him, against his will of course.

entry.title: The Full Moon (Big Sky, Montana and West Yellowstone Park, Montana)
entry.summary:
Author: Mswriter07

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,977Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 70

Summary: They went over to the west Yellowstone Park area, and Derek got them a decent area to camp because there were so many people in the group. They were able to find the area well enough, and they started setting up all of their camping gear. Stiles worked his tech magic so they could still have access to the internet for basics.A couple of hours later, they were ready for lunch, and Derek got out the cooler with sandwich ingredients and a few bags of chips for the pack to make on their own. He took care of his and Stiles' lunch. When Derek set Stiles' food in front of him, Stiles said, “As much as I like you guys taking care of me, I can make my food and stuff.”Derek sat next to him and said, “It’s no problem. You’re the priority this trip. You need to rest, and we’ll do the caring for you part.”“But what about caring for you guys too. You guys need just as much rest as I do after all the stunts Scott and Allison pulled.”“And we are resting by taking care of you.”

entry.title: How To Colossally Fuck Shit Up
entry.summary:
Author: Cashewchococake

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 37,801Chapters: 22/?Kudos: 150

Summary: A story about Derek and Stiles building their family and trying to find their way to each other.orStiles was looking at him expectedly.Derek took a deep breath and prepared himself for the upcoming words. “But I wasn’t the only one he smelled like, Stiles.”He looked pleadingly at Stiles, who'd gone deathly pale, and was now shaking his head.“Stiles-, Eli is your son.” Derek forced out.Stiles let out a small breathless sound of “Oh!”He shot up from the couch and took his head between his hands, pulling his hair.When that didn’t help to quiet the raging flood of questions in his head, he started pacing.“What? -I mean…how? How is that even possible?""Why the hell would you keep that from me?” He was spluttering.Stiles couldn’t believe what he was hearing.  Why would Derek do that?

entry.title: Way Down We Go
entry.summary:
Author: Elizabeth1985

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 72,236Chapters: 22/?Kudos: 666

Summary: Life is getting unsteady in Beacon Hills. With Peter back from the dead, virgins being sacrificed, and an Alpha pack hot on their heels, it is so not the time to get caught up in a confused swirl of WTF with Derek Hale. Except Stiles can't sleep and Derek can help. In the same way the wolves can draw pain, they can share emotion, they can calm. Derek, against his better judgement, uses these supernatural skills to help Stiles sleep sans nightmares.But here's the thing... when you let the floodgates of emotion open, not everything stays where it should.

entry.title: Shattered and Bound
entry.summary:
Author: DaisyBeats

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,323Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 90

Summary: After losing Derek and his father to a feral Scott in the aftermath of the Nogitsune, a shattered Stiles kills his former best friend and is left drowning in guilt and grief.Unable to live in a world where everyone he loves is gone, he casts a one way time travel spell meant to rewrite it all - only to wake up years earlier than expected, in a peaceful dimension where he never existed and the Hales are still alive.Haunted by trauma and drawn to a younger, unbroken Derek, Stiles must navigate healing, fate, and love in a world that was never meant to be his.
